rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with open plan leading to the living area and kitchen.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious living room designed for family gatherings, integrated with an industrial theme.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the kitchen and living area.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Fully functional industrial-style kitchen with modern appliances.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A bedroom for guests integrated on the ground floor to ensure accessibility.

additional_features.description: A compact pool designed to maximize space and functionality.
Expansive garden with landscaping, aligned with Vastu principles.
Each bedroom features a spacious balcony providing ventilation and natural light.
